data.title: China Music Corp
data.meta_description: China Music Corp - Online platform for streaming music. Acquired by Tencent. Raised a total funding of $120M over 1 round from 1 investor. China Music Corp has 31 competitors.

China Music Corp - About the company

What does China Music Corp do?

China Music Corp is an online platform where users can stream different types of music on the platform. Has launched an app for iOS and android platforms. Has merged with cool dog music in Dec 2013 increasing their combined market share to 17% as of Q2 2014. Other dominant companies in the field are controlled by BATs (Baidu, Alibaba, and Tencent). Tencent's music platform Tencent QQ music has a market share of 14.2% and that of Alibaba is 14.1%. The company was merged with Tencent in 2016. Tencent reportedly holds close to 60% stake after the acquisition as against to its 16% stake prior to the merger. The company is valued at $2.7B after the merger..

Which sectors and market segments does China Music Corp operate in?

China Music Corp serves in the B2C space in the Media & Entertainment market segments.

The primary business model of China Music Corp is :Media & Entertainment > Music Tech > ***** **** > ***** ******

China Music Corp's acquisition details

China Music Corp got acquired by Tencent on Jul 13, 2016 at an acquisition amount of $2.7B.

Click here to take a look at China Music Corp 's acquisition in detail

China Music Corp's funding and investors

How much funding has China Music Corp raised till date?

China Music Corp has raised a total funding of $120M over 1 round.

What are the most recent funding rounds of China Music Corp?

Its latest funding round was a Series A round on Sep 12, 2014 for $120M. 1 investor participated in its latest round, which include Tencent.

Who are China Music Corp's investors?

China Music Corp has 1 institutional investor - Tencent.

China Music Corp's Competitors and alternates

Competitive landscape of China Music Corp

China Music Corp ranks 10 th among 31 competitors which include Netease Music, Joox Music and KuGou. 6 of its competitors are funded while 6 have exited. Overall, China Music Corp and its competitors have raised over $1.68B in funding across 29 funding rounds involving 29 investors. There are 3 public and 3 acquired companies in the entire competition set.
